SDSS bad photometry (mag = -9999) have been removed
All surveys have been restricted to 14 < mag < 22.5 & 0 < magerr < 1
Sorting along uid then mjd

This data needs colour transformations (to PS system) and outliers removed (using MAD)

lc_0: 000000_200000
lc_1: 200001_320000
lc_2: 320001_420000
lc_3: 420001_526356
